Script.ServerVersion: Oracle RightNow CX Cloud Service August 2013 (Build 128 - 08/12/2013 21:10) CE Version: allsites-rnw-release-13-8-0-1 PL:

FormattedText.Text: Thank you for calling Pella. This is $currentuser.firstname. Is this $contacts.name.first $contacts.name.last? I just need to confirm your address. I show your address as $contacts.addr.street, $contacts.addr.prov_id, is this correct?
Ok, $contacts.name.first. How may I help you today?

Your parts are being ordered now and should arrive within 7 business days. In the meantime if you should have any further questions, or if you have any questions after you receive those parts, please give us a call or visit our Web page at www. pella.com. If you would call for this same issue you can reference Event #$incidents.i_id.
Thank you for calling Pella, have a great day!
